verses.verse: The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was upon me, and He <S%H3318>brought<s%> me out by the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H5117>set<s%> me <S%H5117>down<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H1237>valley;<s%> and it was <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H6106>bones.<s%>

And He caused me to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> them <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [there were] <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H1237>valley;<s%> and <S%H2009>lo,<s%> [they were] <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3002>dry.<s%>

And He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> can <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>?" And I <S%H559>answered,<s%> "O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> Thou <S%H3045>knowest.<s%>"

Again He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H5012>"Prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, 'O <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H6106>bones,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>'

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6106>bones,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I will cause <S%H7307>breath<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> you that you may <S%H2421>come<s%> to <S%H2421>life.<s%>

'And I will <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H1517>sinews<s%> on you, make <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H5927>grow<s%> <S%H5927>back<s%> on you, <S%H7159>cover<s%> you with <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> in you that you may <S%H2421>come<s%> <S%H2421>alive;<s%> and you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>' "

So I <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> as I was <S%H6680>commanded;<s%> and as I <S%H5012>prophesied,<s%> there was a <S%H6963>noise,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H7494>rattling;<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>together,<s%> <S%H6106>bone<s%> to its <S%H6106>bone.<s%>

And I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H1517>sinews<s%> were on them, and <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H5927>grew,<s%> and <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H7159>covered<s%> <S%H4605><s%> them; but <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> in them.

Then He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H5012>"Prophesy<s%> to the <S%H7307>breath,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H7307>breath,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H935>"Come<s%> from the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds,<s%> O <S%H7307>breath,<s%> and <S%H5301>breathe<s%> on <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2026>slain,<s%> that they <S%H2421>come<s%> to <S%H2421>life.<s%> "'"

So I <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> as He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me, and the <S%H7307>breath<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into them, and they <S%H2421>came<s%> to <S%H2421>life,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> on their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> an <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army.<s%>

Then He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%> are the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> 'Our <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H3001>dried<s%> up, and our <S%H8615>hope<s%> has perished. We are completely <S%H6>cut<s%> <S%H1504>off.<s%>'

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I will <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H6913>graves<s%> and cause you to <S%H5927>come<s%> up out of your <S%H6913>graves,<s%> My <S%H5971>people;<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"Then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> when I have <S%H6605>opened<s%> your <S%H6913>graves<s%> and caused you to <S%H5927>come<s%> up out of your <S%H6913>graves,<s%> My <S%H5971>people.<s%>

"And I will <S%H5414>put<s%> My <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> within you, and you will <S%H2421>come<s%> to <S%H2421>life,<s%> and I will <S%H5117>place<s%> you on your own <S%H127>land.<s%> Then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> it," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>' "
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> again to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"And you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> for yourself <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick<s%> and <S%H3789>write<s%> on it, 'For <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> his <S%H2270>companions<s%>'; then <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H6086>stick<s%> and <S%H3789>write<s%> on it, 'For <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> his <S%H2270>companions.<s%>'
"Then <S%H7126>join<s%> them for yourself <S%H259>one<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%> into <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick,<s%> that they may <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"And <S%H9201>when<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> to you <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'Will you not <S%H5046>declare<s%> to us <S%H4100>what<s%> you mean by <S%H428>these<s%>?'

<S%H1696>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I will <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> his <S%H2270>companions;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>put<s%> them with it, with the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick,<s%> and they will be <S%H259>one<s%> in My <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"'
"And the <S%H6086>sticks<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3789>write<s%> will be in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

"And <S%H1696>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I will <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they have <S%H1980>gone,<s%> and I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> them from <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> them into their own <S%H127>land;<s%>

and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> will be <S%H4428>king<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> of them; and they will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and they will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be <S%H2673>divided<s%> into <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms.<s%>

"And they will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H2930>defile<s%> themselves with their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> or with their <S%H8251>detestable<s%> <S%H8251>things,<s%> or with <S%H3605>any<s%> of their <S%H6588>transgressions;<s%> but I will <S%H3467>deliver<s%> them from <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> <S%H4186>places<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and will <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them. And they will be My <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will be their <S%H430>God.<s%>

"And My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> will be <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, and they will <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd;<s%> and they will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in My <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H6213>observe<s%> them.

"And they shall <S%H3427>live<s%> on the <S%H776>land<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> My <S%H5650>servant,<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> your fathers <S%H1>lived;<s%> and they will <S%H3427>live<s%> on it, they, and their <S%H3427>sons,<s%> and their <S%H1121>sons<s%>' sons, <S%H1121>forever<s%><S%H5704>;<s%> and <S%H5769>David<s%> My <S%H1732>servant<s%> shall be their <S%H5650>prince<s%> <S%H5387>forever.<s%>

"And I will <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> with them; it will be an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them. And I will <S%H5414>place<s%> them and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> them, and will <S%H5414>set<s%> My <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> in their <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
"My <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H4908>place<s%> also will be with them; and I will be their <S%H430>God,<s%> and they will be My <S%H5971>people.<s%>

"And the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H6942>sanctifies<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when My <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> is in their <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"' "
